Mods.Name: Extortion Menu
Mods.Description:
FEATURES:
- Stable Menu with lots of Options and Submenu inside Submenu
- All Clients Verification system (Host, Unverified, Verified, V.I.P)
- Names and Verification level are displayed properly in Players Menu
- Host & V.I.P can control other Players mods, also kick from lobby
- Contains all mandatory mods such as godmode, points, perks, etc
- Weapons + Ammo customized different for each map (Also checks whether you are in correct map)
- Teleport Locations for all maps with 8 unique locations to choose from
- Lobby settings such as Speed, Jump, and Gravity all work
- Specialty mods such as Unlimited Jetgun (Improved) and Unlimited Paralyzer included
- Host Only Menu that contains Super Perks, Timescale, Restart Map, and more
- Jetpack Toggle
- Camo Changer
- Model Changer with over 17+ models for each map

INSTALL NOTES:
- Tested on many CEX/DEX4.50ITA & REBUG DEX with no issues

HOW TO USE:
L1 + R3 = Open the Menu
SQUARE = Select Option
L1 = Scroll Up
R1 = Scroll Down
R3 = Go Back/Close Menu
**Make sure Button Layout is Default

KNOWN BUGS:
- Game will freeze if you are watching theatre as the Host (Not Sure)
- Teddy Bear in Models doesn't work, will need to replace

- Ultimate83HD
- ...and Everyone else who contributed

Hi guys, after 1 year I've finally done the update of my All-In-One Mod Menu.

This version is more cleaner, more stable with new features you never seen in COD4 other menus.

New features of AIO V2:

Auto anti-cheats: Anti-cheats automatically launched for each players at the connection.
Auto anti-glitches (elevators, big bounces, rpg jumps): Added anti rpg jumps.
New menu design/style: New menu style, animations etc..
Setting menu for all players: Each players have a setting menu to edit their ranks, safe area etc...
Safe area: Safe area to edit the positions of the HUDs.
Notification box: Notification box when you choose the game mode, prestige etc...
Clean vision: Some game modes use a color correction, by changing the game mode the vision is correctly cleaned.
5 seconds Intermission time : In the lobby the default time is 55 seconds between games, i've changed the time to 5 seconds.
3 different end game: First end game with the captain Price picture from the campaign, second show the credits (when no game mode loaded), third is the loading game mode animation.
Custom rank system added in CS and Hide and Seek: Custom rank system added, you're not deranked, the scoreboard just show the custom rank. The custom rank is saved on the profil!
Custom stats for the game modes: Like the custom ranks, some game modes use custom stats, like total zombies killed, wins etc...
Host icon on the scoreboard: Host icon on the scoreboard show the host of the game.
New clan tag: Changed the old ugly clan tag [FP<3] by [One.]
Black list aio servers: If you join a player who use the AIO V2 you will be automatically kicked in the loading screen. To disable the blacklist put the clan tag [ENTR] or [One.].
Restart, anti-join can be turned only in private match: You can't restart a match in a public games same for the anti-join.
Loading game mode animation: New animation.
Game mode poll removed : New version in the AIO V3.
Optimized menu security: A script check if HUDs can be deleted on the screen to show correctly the menu/informations.
New doheart: New doheart with moving animation.
Replay mod added in CJ game mode: You can replay the last 60 seconds with custom param. (only in CJ game mode).
Infected game mode added: Infected like on MW3.
Sharpshooter game mode added: Sharpshooter added.
AIO Message infos for all at the end: At each end game a message is shown in the lobby. Messages about the AIO.
Cod4 stats not saved in aio lobbies: Every stats (kills/deaths/assists etc...) is not saved in the AIO lobbies (only in the game mode).
Kick spammers: Kick players who spam Rank 55.
Host can't change ranks: The host can't change players ranks, he just can send a question if the player want change his rank.
Update checker: My last new, a script check and show if a new version of AIO is available!

COD4 Anti Cheat System (PS3 Only)

This anti cheat system removes a players mods when they join your game.
It will reset all dvars to default before anyone spawns in.
It will also disable all types of infectable mod menus.
If you suspect someone has managed to bypass the Anti Cheat System you can use the Kick Menu.

The first thing you need to do is go start a private match.
When the game starts press L1 + Square to open the Kick Menu.
Select Force Host by pressing Square and then exit the Kick Menu by pressing R3 (Melee).
End the game and go play online without worrying about annoying Hackers!!!:yes:

Mods.Name: Ghost Legacy Edition Menu
Mods.Description:
UPDATE #9

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: What is Stealth Mode?
A: This is for anyone using my patch but don't want everyone else to know they're in a modded game.
Start a private match then open the menu and select Host Menu. Once you're in Host Menu scroll all the way down and select Stealth Mode. Exit private match and Stealth Mode will be activated.

What does Stealth Mode do?
It will set all the modified dvars and everything else to default.
It will remove the brick gun and default weapon.
It will remove the GHOSTfaceKILLr74 text every time a player spawns.
Anyone joining your match will not know they're in a modded game.
Stealth Mode will always stay on until you turn it off in the menu or you exit COD4.
Stealth Mode works in private match, online, LAN, splitscreen and in any game mode(like Zombieland).


Q: What can I do to keep the game from lagging?
A: Avoid giving to many players Co-Host. Try not to give more than 4 players Co-host especially playing online matches like Ground War.
Don't spam the options or turn on to many mods at the same time. Try to remember what mods you turned on so you can turn them off if the game starts to lag.
Don't spawn large object like a Skybase or a Merry Go Round while using bots. If this happens try kicking all the bots to reduce lag.
Select Delete/Lockout Objects in the Co-Host Menu and it will delete all spawned objects (Merry Go Round, Sky Base).
You can also use the Delete/Lockout Objects feature to lockout large spawnable objects. This will keep other players who has Co-Host from spawning large objects that would lag the game.
If you're still having lag issues open the menu go to Host Menu and select Restart or just end the match.


Q: D-PAD not working properly?
A: Try pressing SELECT button or D-PAD down on your controller.
If that doesn't work open the menu go to Host Menu then D-PAD Menu and reset your D-pad.


Q: What is USB Infection?
A: This is for those with a custom CFG but can't bypass. First create a folder called MW1 in the root of your USB. Rename your custom CFG to MODS.cfg and place it in MW1 folder. MW1/MODS.cfg
Have someone who's using my GHOST Patch give you access to the menu so you can infect yourself with the USB Infection. When you're infected backout go to SPLIT SCREEN and choose the map Shipment. Once you're playing in Shipment press the SELECT button and your CFG should be ready to go.


Q: I've been using a lot of mods and now the game doesn't run or display properly?
A: Open the menu then Vision Menu and select Normal Vision.
If that doesn't help go to Host Menu then Game Menu and select Reset Game.
If you're still having problems then you should restart COD4.


Q: Can I join your game?
A: Yes!!! Send a friend request to GHOSTfaceKILLr74 saying NGU and I'll add you.


Hope this helps!

Play SHIPMENT On Any Public Match
Download this file GfK.cfg and place it in the root of a USB.
Place USB on the right slot of your PS3.
You can go on a public match like Team Deathmatch and it will always choose SHIPMENT.
Remove USB From your PS3 if you want to play other maps.
You can edit GfK.cfg if you want another map.

What's new in version 4.0? (last update)
LAS DIVINAS REVELATIONS VER 4.0

1. completely realigned all the overlapping texts and misplaced hud elements, to function perfectly for all possible PS3 and PC resolutions.
2. changed the Pro Mod game mode with a new sharper and smoother vision
3. fixed a registration bug - false ban alert - that could occur if someone edited the hosts file before register.
4. a new redesigned and easier to use registration app is now included inside the download folder.
5. Players with disabled clan tag support can now register using the new tool to auto generate their key.
6. Some other in game minor fixes and improvements.

Version 3.5 Change Log (older one)
LAS DIVINAS REVELATIONS VER 3.5

CHANGE LOG - BUG FIXES

COMMON BUG FIXES
1. fixed -Artillery selector overlapping issue while pressing 'X' in menu.
2. fixed -Auto anti-join while in legit mode.
3. fixed -Custom menu style doesn't take effect sometimes in online matches.
4. fixed -If god mode turned off while in menu player can be killed.
5. fixed -Clan tag validation for other players in legit mode.
6. fixed -Ban checks are now active even if clan tag validation is disabled.
7. fixed -Overlapping kill streak notification text.

GAME TYPES FIXES
1. fixed -Domination not load issue.
2. fixed -Some ps3 freezing issues in map restart.

ZOMBIELAND
1. fixed -Invalid host bug.
2. fixed -Host can be picked up as a zombie at start.
3. fixed -Gameplay for dom, sab, hq.
4. fixed -Demo mode force ranked match and crashing issues in split-screen.

IN GAME MESSAGES
1. Improved some objective text messages.

KILLSTREAKS
1. fixed -A minor issue with remote killstreaks logic.

Other minor fixes and improvements.

It is highly recommended to download the latest version 4.0 especially if you are a pc user. This will allow you to enjoy this patch in every possible HD resolution with no misaligned hud elements any more.
If you are a PS3 user also and had problems trying to have your account verified with the previews version 3.5, then the new version with the updated registration tool may help you!
There are not major changes in ver 4.0 and it was originally planned for PCs only but I fixed some this in the PS3 one too. You may never notice some big changes but I think is a must to install if you really liked this patch series!

Mods.Name: IW4 Server Anti-Cheat Menu
Mods.Description:
This is a .sprx file that i made to block CFG FF/CFG USB players or anyone cheating such as sprx Aimbot etc.

This menu gives you the option to kick/ban a client from your game.

There is a auto system to detect CFG player and if the system see they are using CFG stuff then it will kick them so as long as they don't use the edited stuff on the game then they will not get kicked.

It also has two checks to see if anyone is 11th prestige or if they have a modded clan name, if so it will kick them from the server saying they cannot have modded prestige or clan name on this server.

This is meant for legit people only who wanna play it like the old time without having to worry about people cheating in the game.

If you are playing and you think someone is cheating like using sprx aimbot or if the system didn't pick up the CFG info then you can kick/ban the client.

The ban option will only ban them from your lobby so they will never be able to join it again, this will reset once you quit the game as its all saved in memory not a txt file.

You can also clear all server bans in host menu if you happen to get the error message of max bans executed or if you wanna clear them all. The max limit is 1024.

I did not add the option to unban anyone so if you want to unban someone then you will have to quit game or clear all bans in host menu.

I also give you the option to edit your fov if you don't like the default 65 as i don't myself.

The force host is pretty good i got host every time i played using this so it should do its job.

There is also a check to toggle on/off DLC maps if you have them installed as when you do you can only connect with people who have them installed aswell so if you disable em you can connect with everyone again but you can't play on DLC maps until you enable them again.

But anyways that about sums it up, if you have any question about this feel free to ask.


What not to do

Do not use a Tool, Cheat, Change PSN Name, have 11th Prestige or a Modded Clan name or this will not work properly.

How to use menu

DPAD-UP + [ ] = Open
DPAD-UP = Up Scroll
DPAD-DOWN = Down Scroll
X = Select
O = Back
R3 = Close

No one can see the menu as its using engine text, so only you


How to use

This only works on DEX/DECR


Update 1.2 (Whats New)

Added MOTD text.
Option to Unban any client that you have banned.
Option to Draw FPS.
Rebuilt some functions to make system more stable and fixed misc things that need fixing.
Added the option to select any map you want to play when waiting for lobby to start (Press Select button to select new map in pre-game lobby).

If anyone finds new bugs or problems will try and fix them asap (But if there is any it would be something misc as i have been playing with this for hours).

Anyways enjoy the new update!

Mods.Name: Ultimate Lobby for All
Mods.Description:
Hey everyone!

This is my latest, greatest, and maybe last MW3 EBOOT. Since BOII is in full swing, this will be released to everyone instead of just Elite members. I am releasing this since other people seem to have been figuring out how to do things like unlimited ammo.

Features of this EBOOT:

All players:
-Super jump
-Super speed
-No fall damage
-Unlimited ammo
-No recoil
-Move around before match starts
-Super AC-130
-Constant super steady aim (no perk needed)
-Constant super double tap (no perk/attachment needed)
-Predator missile martydrom
-Javelin Macross (won't kill you when you shoot)
-Instant Javelin Impact
-Sleight of Hand reloads instantly
-Steady aim has perfect accuracy
-Quadruple weapon XP in all gamemodes
-Instant Predator Missile
-Use Square from far away
-Use mounted guns from far away
-Suicide in Domination, Headquarters, Demolition, Capture the Flag, or Kill Confirmed gives 32500 XP
-MOAB timer is about 8.9 hours

Host only:
-Custom welcome message upon loading game
-Broken glass floats up into the sky
-Dead bodies/care packages/falling objects have low gravity
-Disabled smoke trail/explosion FX (to prevent lag from unlimited ammo)
-You can now turn a full 360 degrees while prone
-No sway while aiming down sight
-Pink names for you and your party members
-Vision tweaks (looks like PC promod; reduces lag in game)
-Pickup prints (game tells you if you pick up ammo)
-Blue Scoreboard Text Color
-Changed Scoreboard Text
-Promod FOV
-Changed killfeed colors
-Ragdoll Jitter (dead bodies flip around erratically)
-Force Host (better than any other)
-Constant Radar (like MW2 radar hacks)

How to use:

1. Download the file for your region and FW. Rename to EBOOT.BIN.
2. Copy the file to /dev_hdd0/game/YOUR REGION/USRDIR/.
3. Launch MW3, and enjoy!

Credits:
-iMCSx for helping find some things
-aerosoul94 for no fall damage

Information:

-You may get banned using this. Be careful!
-Arkaaden and Village will not work due to vision tweaks.
-If you memory edit while using this, your chances of getting banned will increase.

Have fun everyone

It has every feature that you could imagine such as spawning vehicles, free cam, and changing player models. 

Works for every Red Dead Redemption version/edition (GOTY, Original, BLUS, BLES, etc) on PS3 (no jailbreak) and Xbox 360 (RGH/JTAG). RPCS3 (PS3 Emulator) is also working with it so you could basically mod on PC.

Mods.Name: Mortal Kombat 9 Trilogy Edition Mod
Mods.Description:
This is version 1.60 of the Trilogy Edition mod for MK9.
This is a mod that primarily aims to rebalance the entire cast of MK9, although it's scope will be expanded in the future.
The changes done are in a file named Patch changes, which is in the rar.

Installation
The mod is intended to be used on the Komplete Edition of MK9 (doesn't matter if it's the USA/BLUS or European/BLES
version) so, no official support is given for non KE users (sorry guys!) and I do not own the PSN version, so I have
no clue whether or not will it work to a 100%. My recommendation? Stick to the Komplete Edition.
Anyways, installation is quite simple: simply extract the USRDIR folder into your PS3_GAME folder of your Komplete
Edition. Overwrite all files, and that's it! Yeah, not very hard. In case you run into any problems following the installation,
you might want to try deleting your MKKE install data from your PS3, and then starting the game again.
I've tested it on version 1.07, but it should work on 1.05 (unpatched Komplete Edition).
The changes made are listed on a separate file called Patch changes.txt.
Hope you have fun!

Known issues:
MK3 Sektor and Mileena costumes crash the game (PC ONLY) FIXED AS OF TE 1.25
Quan Chi's Skeletal Boost during Trance buff causes him to only be able to use Trance once (PC ONLY) FIXED AS OF THE TE 1.25 HOTFIX
Noob Saibot's EX Shadow Charge allows for an unintended 17% combo with the Slide (BOTH PLATFORMS). NOT FIXED YET.
Quan Chi can do a second Skeletal Boost during Trance if he had already done one before using Trance on an opponent. (BOTH PLATFORMS) NOT FIXED YET
(Thankfully, buffs do not stack, it simply resets the buff)

Special Thanks
MK9 modding community (in particular, digitaloverdose for his mkscriptextractor, Gniarf for his FNV1 hashes discovery and HowardC for the
FNV1 string dehasher)
The TestYourMight community for their feedback.
REO, Biggs, RM Atk!, XSmokeX, MIT, DetroitBalln for their balance suggestions (sorry guys if I fucked up too bad the first time around, haha)
BillStickers for his help with porting to PC.
Warner Bros and Netherrealm Studios for bringing us such an awesome game.

This mod was made by futuretime23.

Misc. changes:

    Custom title screen has been added.
    Medium in Training mode has been changed to Overh. to avoid confusion with mids (it's labelled Overh. due to character limit)
    HighOrLow (as stated in the coalesced.eng file) has been changed to Mid. Keep in mind that some attacks that are High will show up as Mid
    (For example, Smoke's 21, defined to be a mid attack but because of the small hitbox, it behaves like a high)
    Some info on the boot up screen has been changed to credit people who helped with the mod. (Thanks guys!)

Mods.Description: The Shake Package is a non game breaking mod menu that gives you more control over your game. This menu gives you control over the size of the lobby, the maps you play, filters out modders using cheats that gives them an advantage and much more! The ability to switch the game mode from Team Deathmatch to whatever game mode you wish to play speeds up the matchmaking process and allows you play matches that would be otherwise impossible in this current year. If you still enjoy playing older Call of Duty games but run into issues with matchmaking and modders then the Shake Package is the tool you need!

Mods.Name: Debug + Crash Fix (MP/ZM)
Mods.Description:
I've decided to convert the original EBOOT provided by BlastsMods and make it load Zombies instead.
I've provided both the same EBOOT, and the Zombies one. If you have HxD find the stupid little easter egg I added.
I've also removed the 'fix_bytes.bin' file as it is confusing as fuck even with the instructions lmao. Enjoy!

The EBOOTs do not have anti-ban on them. So make sure to use a menu, such as G'Henisys v2.
Orrrrr Paradox Framework 3.0. [Cracked by us in the discord link at the bottom of this txt document] ;)

[Put .sprx files in /dev_hdd0/tmp and name them 'BO2_MP.sprx' For Multiplayer, and 'BO2_ZM.sprx' For Zombies]

CRASH NOTE: Loading the same EBOOT right after restarting the game may crash your console.
Including switching from the Multiplayer EBOOT to the Zombies EBOOT (and vise versa) may also result in a crash.
Just reboot your console and load the EBOOT you want.

FIX NOTE: To permanently fix that potential crash, simply make sure the EBOOT is always loading an sprx file.

(They are both Debug EBOOTS, so DEX users can use TMAPI with them)

- JIREX

Welcome to a Genisys update named G'Henisys, the first ever BO2 offhost menu on HEN/CEX/DEX for free by kiwi_modz.

=------------------------------------------------------------=

https://dl.psx-place.com/threads/tut-sprx-menus-on-hen.23966/

Yes this might come as a shock for those who didn't know I came back to release this update.
I have spent only the last 3 days updating and well here's what I have completed.

Massive thanks to ImDaCrazyKing(hen), Faults(hen), Kristijan R(hen) and xLynexa(dex) for testing and making sure everything worked.

Change log:

Fixed anti aim disabling when aimbot isn't targeting.
Fixed silent aim not working online.

Added new purple colour theme for this update.
Added jitter anti aim.
Added riot backwards anti aim  (with out lock up) - (can use jitter with this now).
Added lock up anti aim.
Added cancel reload (will only cancel animation if aimbot has a target).
Added options to disable on screen infos like fps, resolution, server info etc.
Added save load config placement for fov and camo spoofer.
Added riot as primary disables anti aim.

Replaced ignore shield with anti shield damage .
Theirs a easter egg in the menu that once enabled your camo changes each time your weapon fires.

Bugs:
If you have a config with the current menu, you will not be able to use that file with this update, you will need to make a new one once you have this menu loaded.
If and when you have found the easter egg, toggling to a config setting then changing the 'easter egg' option value (hint) will crash you.

New additions:
One eboot / One sprx for hen and dex consoles.

Cheers and enjoy.

kiwi_modz.

Mods.Name: Crash Fix (MP/ZM)
Mods.Description:
I've decided to convert the original EBOOT provided by BlastsMods and make it load Zombies instead.
I've provided both the same EBOOT, and the Zombies one. If you have HxD find the stupid little easter egg I added.
I've also removed the 'fix_bytes.bin' file as it is confusing as fuck even with the instructions lmao. Enjoy!

The EBOOTs do not have anti-ban on them. So make sure to use a menu, such as G'Henisys v2.
Orrrrr Paradox Framework 3.0. [Cracked by us in the discord link at the bottom of this txt document] ;)

[Put .sprx files in /dev_hdd0/tmp and name them 'BO2_MP.sprx' For Multiplayer, and 'BO2_ZM.sprx' For Zombies]

CRASH NOTE: Loading the same EBOOT right after restarting the game may crash your console.
Including switching from the Multiplayer EBOOT to the Zombies EBOOT (and vise versa) may also result in a crash.
Just reboot your console and load the EBOOT you want.

FIX NOTE: To permanently fix that potential crash, simply make sure the EBOOT is always loading an sprx file.

(They are both Debug EBOOTS, so DEX users can use TMAPI with them)

- JIREX
